definition: embroidered pouch for carrying loose change etc/purse/pocket (in clothing)
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
poached egg/egg fried on both sides
jade purse, a cultivar of lychee

sentences.english: The other thing of consideration in the bathroom decoration is the limited amount of budget.
sentences.chinese: 另外在浴室安装中需要考虑的就是我们有限的荷包。

sentences.english: He had a light breakfast of poached eggs and tea.
sentences.chinese: 他早餐就吃了点水煮荷包蛋，喝了点茶。

sentences.english: In Jingpo People's eyes, Hebao stands for happiness.
sentences.chinese: 荷包在他们眼中象征了幸福。

sentences.english: Sometimes, bronze mirrors and combs were put together in lacquer boxes or small pouches.
sentences.chinese: 有时把铜镜和木梳一起放在漆匣内或小荷包里。

sentences.english: Then he took out a tobacco pouch and a packet of papers and rolled himself a cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 他接着掏出烟荷包和一盒卷烟纸卷了一支烟。

sentences.english: So it is that the purses of the magistrates and their underlings perforce remain empty.
sentences.chinese: 于是知事及其僚佐们的荷包，只好空着。

sentences.english: So your poached egg preference sets you apart from the hardboiled fans at home.
sentences.chinese: 常吃荷包蛋已经让你远离享用水煮蛋的乐趣了。

sentences.english: Poached eggs on toast are very nice
sentences.chinese: 荷包蛋和土司非常的美味。

sentences.english: Mr. Knight's access to classes may have something to do with his pocketbook.
sentences.chinese: 奈特能来上课跟他殷实的荷包可能有点关系。

sentences.english: Would you like your eggs sunny-side up?
sentences.chinese: 您要一面煎黄的荷包蛋吗？

sentences.english: He picked them up and put them in his wallet.
sentences.chinese: 完颜康捡了起来，放入了荷包。

sentences.english: He poached an egg for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 他的早饭是水煮荷包蛋。

sentences.english: Plus, you save a whole bundle of money.
sentences.chinese: 再加上，你还为自己的荷包省钱了。

sentences.english: Invasives can also hurt agriculture and hit consumers in the pocketbook. For example, some breakfast items cost more because of them, including
sentences.chinese: 生物入侵还会伤害农业并让消费者的荷包受损。

sentences.english: Even a commercially minded lender could not sit by as peers opened their wallets.
sentences.chinese: 一个有商业头脑的领导人不会坐等其同僚打开荷包。

definition: silk brocade bag, used in ancient times to hold poetry manuscripts and other precious items/(fig.) tip (a piece of practical advice)
cloth pouch open in the middle, forming two bags/jacket worn for Chinese wrestling
to put into (one's pockets, clothes)/Taiwan pr. [chuai3]
full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)
undergarment covering the chest and abdomen
